title: Data Quality Report
---

# Data Summary
This database contains `r ccd@nepisodes` episodes from 
`r length(unique(ccd@infotb$site_id)) - 1` sites. Based on the NHS numbers and
PAS numbers, `r max(ccd@infotb$pid)` unique patients are found. 

## The original XML files and parse information
```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressWarnings(library(pander))
panderOptions("digits", 2) 
panderOptions("table.split.table", Inf)

infotb <- ccd@infotb
neps.file <- infotb[, list("Number of Eipsode"=.N), by=parse_file]
site.file <- infotb[, list("Sites"=paste(unique(site_id), collapse=", ")), by=parse_file]
setkey(neps.file, "parse_file")
setkey(site.file, "parse_file")
pander(merge(neps.file, site.file))
```
